title: Elizabeth Warren Commits Murder, 157 Lbs of Weed 2.21.20
itunes:title: Elizabeth Warren Commits Murder, 157 Lbs of Weed 2.21.20
description:
In episode 574, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Billy Wayne Davis to discuss the Democratic Debates, Dana Rohrbacher, Roger Stone's sentencing, the Brown's Greg Robinson's arrest, the McDonalds Quarter pounder scented candle pack, the Lovers & Friends festival, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. NBC NEWS AND MSNBC BREAK RATINGS RECORD AGAIN WITH THE MOST-WATCHED DEMOCRATIC DEBATE EVER
  2. Someone Set Elizabeth Warren's Roast Of Mike Bloomberg To Nas' 'Ether' Beat
  3. Putin’s favorite congressman
  4. Roger Stone sentenced to 40 months in prison for lying to protect Trump
  5. Greg Robinson arrested for alleged possession of 157 pounds of marijuana, could face up to 20 years in prison
  6. McDonald’s Gives Quarter Pounder Fans a Perfecter New Way to Display Their Burger Love
  7. Ludacris, Ms. Lauryn Hill, TLC & Usher to Headline Lovers & Friends Festival
  8. WATCH: Wun Two - Ragazza Al Mare

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
